channel.title: Welcome on Derek Farr
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Derek Farr

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me # Hi, my name is Derek Farr. Thanks for visiting my website.

item.title: Access resources on a remote server with Wireguard
item.description: Access resources on a remote server with Wireguard # Introduction # I self-host a few apps on my home network, using a small single-board computer as my server. Until recently, I was only able to access my self-hosted apps at home, on my home network. That limitation was inconvenient, to say the least. For example, one of the apps I self-host is Actual, an open-source budgeting app that totally changed the way I manage my personal finances.

item.title: About This Site
item.description: About This Site # This site is a basic exemplar of the Jamstack. It uses: Hugo as a static site generator Hugo Book as a theme for Hugo GitHub to host the source code repository Netlify CMS as a “headless” CMS Netlify for hosting and CI/CD More information For a helpful guide to building sites like this—with Jamstack architecture and headless CMS—see this article on stackbit.com.
